entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
